attributes.action: Reimburse non-resident parents who have suffered financially, through no fault of their own, due to this government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we request that this government should compensate non-resident parents still paying child maintenance under the pre-2003 rules. This compensation should consist of the monetary difference between what they have paid and what they should have paid, plus a payment in recognition of the financial hardship unfairly imposed on non-resident parents since the new rules were implemented.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
